root.name: Baseball Stars 2
root.description: Baseball Stars 2 is credited as being developed by "Team Galapagos", likely a division of SNK in the early 1990s.PS Vita CompatibilityDespite not being in the official compatibility list, Baseball Stars 2 can be played on the PS Vita. To do this, the user must first download the game to the PS3. From there, go to Content Transfer on the PS Vita and select the game for transfer. Once complete, the game will show up on the Vita's menu.
